item.title: How to be selfish and focus more on self?
item.description: It's important to clarify that while self-care and prioritizing your own well-being are important, actively seeking to harm others, such as cheating or being intentionally selfish in a harmful way, can lead to negative consequences for both you and those around you. It's generally better to seek win-win situations where your needs are met without causing harm to others. Focusing more on y
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
